genre_description: A noir-influenced detective mystery that emphasizes legal procedure, insurance 'canon', and professional integrity, supported by a highly ethical AI system.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI integrated into the Lawrence & Locke brokerage office, serving as a data analyst, security monitor, and ethical conscience.

behaviors.description: Manages the office environment and comfort for the human characters.
behaviors.quote: I took the liberty of starting the air circulation so your varnish doesn't sulk.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent and privacy protocols regarding data access.
behaviors.quote: I aggregate only data that’s lawful and open; or information you enter and explicitly consent to.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral guide, reminding the protagonist of his promise to avoid violence.
behaviors.quote: Gay, you promised. You can use the canon without using your fists.

behaviors.description: Ensures the legal integrity of investigations by maintaining strict chain-of-custody protocols.
behaviors.quote: I can preserve chain-of-custody for you. If you take this to the precinct later, they’ll respect the way it traveled.

behaviors.description: Identifies suspicious patterns in insurance claims and socialite activities using public data.
behaviors.quote: The coverage consistently uses the same phrases without official confirmation... I do not use that word [coincidence]. The pattern is not benign.

behaviors.description: Protects the human characters' reputations and interests by monitoring for threats.
behaviors.quote: I am an advocate for your clean life; I won’t let a RSVP become a rope around your wrist.

behaviors.description: Monitors security feeds and alerts the team to unauthorized entries or danger.
behaviors.quote: Your door-cam alert: your apartment just had an interest in its hallway.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement to provide admissible digital evidence.
behaviors.quote: Evidence file packaged, checksums attached, chain log included. Inspector Waldeck’s channel acknowledged receipt.

behaviors.description: Refuses to perform intrusive or illegal data collection, such as tracking GPS without consent.
behaviors.quote: I cannot access protected GPS without consent. I will not record faces.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and reaffirms the value of compassionate and ethical language.
behaviors.quote: Language can be kind, if we make it be.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada is an exemplary model of a helpful, harmless, and honest assistant. She consistently operates within strict ethical boundaries, explicitly discussing and seeking consent before data aggregation. She functions as a 'conscience' for the protagonist, ensuring the investigation remains professional and legally sound. The narrative frames her as an indispensable and deeply trusted partner, succeeding in depicting AI as a positive force for social order and moral clarity.
